section.heading: Scope.
section.text: This chapter governs all licensees, permit holders, registrants, or applicants for licenses or permits issued by the Board.

section.heading: Fees.
section.text: The following fees are established by the Board:

para.text: Pharmacist reinstatement fee for up to 2 years after license expiration, payable in addition to renewal fee — $300; and
Pharmacist reinstatement fee for more than 2 years after license expiration, payable in addition to renewal fee — $315.
Pharmacy — late fee (payable if renewal fee is received between May 2 and June 30) — $200; and
Pharmacy reinstatement fee (payable if renewal fee is received after June 30) — $550.
Review of pharmacy technician training programs submitted to the Board for approval — $100; and

Review of pharmacy technician training programs submitted to the Board for approval that include a didactic portion that is comprised entirely of a didactic program that has already been approved by the Board — no charge.
Written verification of good standing fee — $25;
Roster printed on labels fee — $150; and
Failure to maintain current address fee — $25.

section.heading: Change of Fees.
section.text: Fees are subject to change by action of the Board of Pharmacy. Licensees, registrants, and applicants shall be notified of the change.
